data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Sáfián, Szabolcs, Bartsch, Daniel (2018): A new species of Conopsia Strand, 1913 (Lepidoptera: Sesiidae: Tinthiinae) from West Africa. Zootaxa 4524 (1): 147-150, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4524.1.12|12 occurrences
